extendedInfo.description: Show your iPhone friends an app they'll never get! Inhale on the phone mic to smoke! Great at parties!IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE DOWNLOADING or any other issues please check our website (at the link below) for solutions, or EMAIL US. If you just leave a comment we have no way to contact you for details. We reply ASAP!Check out the gameplay video at link below!* 3 water bongs! With bubble noises, pull the bowl to clear it, the whole nine yards!* 9 different pipes!* 9 real strains of weed!* 4 lighters, 10 different colors!* 3 backgrounds!* blow out short breaths for smoke rings * turn phone over to dump bowl* installable to SD card (Froyo and later)How It Works* Pack the bowl, light it up, and inhale on the phone mic to smoke!* Blow out on the phone to exhale smoke onto the screen* Then turn the phone over to dump the cashed bowlCheck out our other apps, Roll A Joint and Nose Candy! And like our Facebook page to see what's next!pot,420,bong,virtual,drugs,marijuana,cannabis

reviews.title: Krunchy! Chewy! Tasty!
reviews.comment: Fun app. Good way to mess with your Stoner friends. @~()
reviews.author: Anthony Miles

reviews.title: Gute
reviews.comment: My eyes are red because of my allergies... That\'s what my drug dealer told me to say if anyone ever asks me why my eyes are red
reviews.author: Kenny Doemel

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Super stoner app. I have AVX setup to open app when I say \"let\'s burn one.\" friends love it. Start puffing on your phone, people in the smoking area, look at you funny, but you know who does partake in an instant. App needs more backgrounds, but you guys are the bong!!  Awesome on Droid Bionic.  Chris ;-)
reviews.author: chris mcelroy

reviews.title: Smoke a boll
reviews.comment: This game is cool can make ur friends lough and find sum enertesting facts as well
reviews.author: Jose Rodriguez

reviews.title: Love this App
reviews.comment: I just enjoy the looks I get when people see me on this. Also the variety of bowls, lighters, and weed. You just need more backgrounds.
reviews.author: Richard Byman

reviews.title: Pretty dope
reviews.comment: Ha this game is pretty cool has just about everything. Should of added more types of bongs though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: It\'s ok but it shouldn\'t be kicked after 1 hit.  Maybe 3 or 4.   And the exhale is really poor.  Gotta figure out something more efficient
reviews.author: Jake Kuhn

reviews.title: Best app ever! Feel sorry for iphone users!
reviews.comment: This is great 4 anytime. I lovd telling my mom im going to smoke weed then she says \"what!?\" and i show her this and she laughs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loving it bro
reviews.comment: This game or app is awesome I play with it when I\'m bored or show my dudes and girls just eat it up its funny fun and cool as hell keep it up I got the roll a joint app too and noise candy there all great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its awesome
reviews.comment: Fun time killer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gets me high as a kite.
reviews.comment: A great party trick or comic relief.
reviews.author: TimothyOnline dotnet

reviews.title: Updates and codes please.
reviews.comment: App needs more Updates and I don\'t mind if you use the coin system. Also needs codes like roll a Joint.
reviews.author: Trey Mattingly

reviews.title: Its great
reviews.comment: Love the app needs more stuff though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freakin awsome
reviews.comment: This is the best smoken app
reviews.author: Jimmie Nobles

reviews.comment: Awesome app! Just wish there was more strains and different color pipes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spectacular
reviews.comment: Works great and makes everyone i show get on there phone and buy it. It is the best app on my phone next to roll a joint
reviews.author: Tom Baker

reviews.comment: Truly cool! I am new to this app stuff so when I deleted it before to make up space I didn\'t realize that once u pay for it it will still be there again so I got it back now with more memory love it!
reviews.author: David Marino

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is fun while you\'re stoned
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Coool
reviews.comment: Like the roll a joint one better tho i think
reviews.author: Tyler Wintringham

reviews.title: LG Optimus G
reviews.comment: I paid for this app and it\'s great but there is no sound when I use on my phone. Please fix this!
reviews.author: Silvano Mayorga
